text: Eri'zama erisazana amanahu hu'za erigahaze, huhagerafi huvempage vogisine, teboline, tevi rekru hunte zotane, Kresramana vu itaramine, kresramna vu eri'za zantamima kazima, kavoma, sipunima, foku'ma, zompama (utensils), nagru hu'nea agu'afi me'nea zantamine, tvaravene kema huntea zama'a kegava hugahaze.
